Frame-by-Frame Analysis  
• Frame 1: The roadway is a multi‐lane surface street with commercial establishments (e.g., a Chili’s and IHOP) on the right. No immediate speed sign is sharply in focus here, but you can see a rectangular sign up ahead on the right.  
• Frame 2: That rectangular sign becomes clearer and appears to read “Speed Limit 50.”  
• Frame 3: The “Speed Limit 50” sign on the right is now fully visible.  
• Frame 4: Again, the “Speed Limit 50” sign is quite prominent on the right shoulder.  
• Frame 5: The same sign is still visible as the dashcam moves past it.  

Contextual Reasoning  
All frames show the same stretch of road with consistent signage. The very visible posted “Speed Limit 50” sign confirms the speed limit on this arterial roadway.  

Match to Answer Choices  
• A (25), B (35), or C (45) do not match the clearly posted “Speed Limit 50” sign.  
• D (50) aligns perfectly with the sign markings observed in multiple frames.  

Provide the Best Answer  
Based on the repeated appearance of the “Speed Limit 50” sign, the best choice is:  
<answer>D</answer>
